sentences.en: A wedding ring is a symbol of eternal love between a married couple.
sentences.cn: 结婚戒指象征已婚夫妇之间永恒的爱.

sentences.en: Anyone who betrays his motherland shall inevitably fall into the abyss of eternal sin and shame.
sentences.cn: 一切出卖祖国的人都必将堕入永远被人唾骂的罪恶深渊.

sentences.en: By wearing the ring on the third finger of the left hand, a married couple symbolically declares their eternal love for each other.
sentences.cn: 将婚戒戴在左手的第三只手指上, 意味着夫妻双方象征性地宣告他们的爱情天长地久,他们定能白头偕老.

sentences.en: Did it not symbolize the eternal , unvarying triumph of Good over Evil?
sentences.cn: 这是不是象征善永远战胜恶?

sentences.en: I am tired of your eternal arguments.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌你们没完没了的争吵.

sentences.en: One single slip brings eternal regret , and looking back, your whole life has passed away.
sentences.cn: 一失足成千古恨, 再回头已过百年身.

sentences.en: Rome has been called the Eternal City.
sentences.cn: 罗马一向被称为不朽之城.

sentences.en: She could not just stay at home and read " eternal triangle'stories.
sentences.cn: 难道成天躲在家里看 张资平 的三角恋爱小说?

sentences.en: She’s an eternal optimist (= she always expects that good things will happen ).
sentences.cn: 她永远是个乐观主义者。

sentences.en: the Christian promise of eternal life
The principles of the Paris Commune radiates with eternal light.
sentences.cn: 巴黎公社的原则闪耀着不灭的光辉.

sentences.en: the promise of eternal life in heaven
The supersession of the old by the new is a general, eternal and inviolable law of the universe.
sentences.cn: 新陈代谢是宇宙间普遍的永远不可抵抗的规律.

sentences.en: The Titans were hurled down there by Zeus to suffer eternal damnation.
sentences.cn: 提坦诸神就被宙斯拉到这儿承受永久的磨难.

sentences.en: Whoever believes in Him shall have eternal life.
sentences.cn: 所有相信上帝的人都会获得永生。

words.tran_cn: 使永恒；使不朽；使不灭（等于eternize）

phrases.tran_cn: 永恒之城；不朽之城（罗马城的别称）

trans.tran_cn: 不朽的，永久的，永恒的，没完没了的
trans.tran_en: continuing for ever and having no end
